pr_title: Use "native" generator for personalized report primary key.

timeline.bodyText: If we don't need this to be portable to other sql dialects then using GenerationType.IDENTITY seems more straightforward. I think supporting the SEQUENCE type is more complicated if we expect pipelines to add to the table consistently rather than just as a single backfill.
timeline.author: wamills

replies.bodyText:
I guess it doesn't need to be portable to all SQL implementations, just MySQL and the hibernate in-memory database for unit tests.
Changed to IDENTITY.
replies.author: karepker

timeline.message:
Use IDENTITY generator for personalized report primary key.

Pull #387 updated the SQL for the prod database, so this is just making
the Java annotations and the SQL consistent.
